vibe: Dusty vinyl crackle, coffee shop rain, and nostalgic warmth. It feels organic, imperfect, and human.
palette: Hazy, atmospheric pads that sound like old tape
Unstable analog synths that detune slightly
Clean, jazzy guitar chords (Nylon or Jazz Amp)

vibe: Tropical heat, sunset parties, sweat, and infectious rhythm. It feels breezy, bright, and undeniably danceable.
palette: Log drums and hollow wood mallets
Marimbas, Kalimbas, and metallic Steel Drums

vibe: Humming in the dark, mental health struggles, styrofoam cups, and looking at the stars. It feels numb, isolated, and comforting.
palette: Clean electric guitars drenched in reverb

vibe: Velvet ropes, 4 AM club lights, fashion week, and expensive leather. It feels sophisticated, repetitive, and soulful.
palette: Korg M1 Organs (that classic house bass)

genre: Future Bass / Melodic Trap / Anthem Rap
vibe: Neon festival lights, confetti cannons, and pure sugar-rush euphoria. It feels massive, bright, and triumphant.
Gritty, cinematic danger, urgent sirens, and aggressive energy. It feels chaotic and street-level.
Cold concrete, haunted houses, sliding basslines, and menacing whispers. It feels ghostly and minimalist.
palette: Haunting, warping synths that bend pitch
Eerie, scary ambient sounds (screams, breath, wind)

vibe: Glitchy video games, sugar overload, digital distortion, and pixelated chaos. It feels synthetic and hyper-active.
palette: Futuristic laser FX and bright leads

vibe: Floating on a cloud, luxury romplers, soft elevators, and dream states. It feels smooth, jazzy, and weightless.
palette: Old video game console startup sounds (PS2/Xbox style)

vibe: Dim lights, incense, late-night texts, and heartbreak. It feels intimate, filtered, and smooth.
palette: Slow, deep pads that sit in the back

vibe: Distorted VHS tapes, drift cars, gritty Memphis dungeons, and aggression. It feels lo-fi and evil.
Pool parties, bright sunshine, viral TikTok dances, and polished gloss. It feels like a vacation.
Backyard boogies, soul train lines, and off-kilter grooves. It feels funky, loose, and warm.
palette: Thick, squelchy analog synth bass (Moog style)

vibe: Blockbuster movie villains, epic war zones, triumph, and orchestral aggression. It feels huge, terrifying, and motivating.
palette: Ethnic flutes, duduks, and weird violins

vibe: Lowriders, palm trees, hydraulics, and unique flows. It feels bouncy, weird, and simple.
Emotional strumming, and heartbreak. It feels organic, tearful, yet hard.
palette: Steel String Acoustic Guitars (bright and clean)
Ouds or Sazs for exotic texture

vibe: Industrial raves, strobe lights, dystopian mosh pits, and noxious fumes. It feels broken, distorted, and futuristic.
palette: Glitchy 8-bit sounds ran through heavy distortion

vibe: Fever dreams, ice castles, holy water, and dissociation. It feels glassy, fragile, and heavenly.
palette: Slow, filtered pads that take up massive space

vibe: A gothic stage play on Mars, tribal drums, stadium status, and dark beauty. It feels theatrical, overwhelming, and artistic.
palette: Distorted Electric Guitars mixed with synths

vibe: A Pixar movie soundtrack glitching out, manic creativity, intimate bedroom recordings exploding into stadiums, and raw human emotion. It feels textural, wide, and overwhelmingly beautiful.
palette: Felt Pianos: Soft, muffled upright pianos where you can hear the mechanics moving
Human Percussion: Beatboxing, stomps, and claps layered to sound huge
Symphonic Strings: Disney-style orchestral swells that transition into glitches
Vocal Choirs: Massive stacks of harmony (often using just the artist's voice)
Acoustic Guitars: Strummed hard, sometimes processed with granular or 'static' effects

vibe: Racing through a 2000s video game level, Sonic Adventure OST, Ridge Racer OST, pastel clouds, and nostalgic speed. It feels wistful, soft, but incredibly fast-paced.
palette: Liquid Pads: Lush, warm synthesizer pads that feel like liquid mercury
Jazzy Rhodes: Fast, improvised electric piano runs
Saxophone Synths: Mellow, artificial sax leads (that specific MIDI sound)
Atmospheric Vox: Breathable, soft vocal textures buried in the mix

genre: Sexy Drill / NYC Jerk / Jersey Club
vibe: A crowded house party in the Bronx, bed squeaks, triplet kick drums, and 'Slizzy' energy. It feels minimal, bouncy, toxic, and hypnotic.
palette: 'The Sample': Usually a pitched-up, filtered R&B sample loops
Club Pianos: Sharp, staccato piano chords hitting on the off-beats
Bed Squeak / FX: That iconic sample and repetitive vocal chants ('Go, Go')
Choir Pads: Sometimes used to add a slightly 'Drill' dark texture to the bounce
Sub Bass: Short, punchy 808s that leave room for the kick drum patterns

vibe: Ghost riding the whip, sideshows, scraping curbs, and wild energy. It feels frantic, fun, and elastic.
Twerking, unapologetic confidence, cash throwing, and high energy. It feels loud, bossy, and infectious.
Talking slick, off-beat flows, hustle culture, and relentless punchlines. It feels fast-paced, anxious, and witty.
Machine-gun flows, breathless speed, intricate rhyme schemes, and dark intensity. It feels athletic, dark, and overwhelming.
Raw aggression, blown-out speakers, humidity, and cartoonish energy. It feels chaotic, loud, and punk-rock.
Cloudy rooms, jet life, smooth jazz samples, and relaxation. It feels hazy, cool, and slow.
Sipping syrup, slow motion visuals, deep voices, and psychedelic haze. It feels heavy, intoxicated, and hypnotic.
